comments.body: Might add version when deprecation goes to error.
Hmm, is that settled yet? What do you think would be a good timeline? CC @njsmith @teoliphant @certik @rgommers
Hard to put that as a version number, since we don't know if the version after 1.8 will be 6 months or 2 years after. I'd say 2 years is reasonable.
@rgommers Okay, I'll add a comment to that effect.

I guess we should probably go the extra step and also add

```
def f():
    warnings.warn("foo", category=DeprecationWarning)
test_case_instance.assert_deprecated(f)
```
